summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4828 for the improvement of 27th Avenue, from Yesler Way to 236 feet north of East Jefferson Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 55665, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
